S04n544:2: kena bhadanta bhagavan hetunā kena kāraṇena kīdṛśenottaptavīryeṇa kuśalamūlena yasya kṛtatvādupacitatvādevatāni jvalanāntaratejorājapramukhāni daśadevaputrasahasrāṇyetarhi trāyastriśaddevabhavanādāgatāni bhagavato'ntike dharmaśravaṇāyopasaṃkrāmanti |
S04n544:3: eteṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ satpuruṣāṇāṃ bodhisattvavyākaraṇaṃ śrutvā bodhau cittamutpādayanti |
S04n544:4: yathāyaṃ ruciraketuḥ satpuruṣo'nāgate'dhvani gaṇanāsamatikrānteṣvanekeṣvasaṃkhyeyakalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasreṣvatikrānteṣu suvarṇaprabhāsitāyāṃ lokadhātāvanuttarāṃ samyakyaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate |
S04n544:5: suvarṇaratnākaracchatrakūṭo nāma tathāgato'rhansamyaksaṃbuddho loka utpatsyate vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavan |
S04n544:6: yāvattasya bhagavataḥ suvarṇaratnākaracchatrakūṭasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya parinirvṛtasya saddharmāntarhite sarveṇa sarve sarvathā sarvaṃ tasya śāsanasyāntarhitasyāyaṃ rūpyaketurnāma dārakaḥ |
S04n544:7: tasya tathāgatasyānusaṃghau tatra caiva virajadhvajalokadhātau suvarṇajambudhvajakāñcanābho nāma tathāgato'rhansamyaksaṃbuddho loka utpatsyate |
S04n544:8: yāvattasya suvarṇadhvajakāñcanāvabhāsasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya parinirvṛtasya sarveṇa sarve sarvathā sarvaṃ tasya śāsanasyāntarhitasyāyaṃ rūpyaprabho dārakaḥ |
S04n544:9: tasya tathāgatasyonusaṃghau tatra caiva virajadhvajalokadhātāvanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate |
S04n544:10: suvarṇaśataraśmiprabhāsagarbho nāma tathāgato'rhanasamyaksaṃbuddho loka utpasyate vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān ||
S04n544:11: te sarva etarhi bhagavatānuttarāyāṃ samyak saṃbodhau vyākṛtāḥ ||
S04n544:12: na caiteṣāṃ bhadanta bhagavajjvalanāntaratejorājapramukhānāṃ daśānāṃ devaputrasahasrāṇāṃ yāvadvistīrṇā bodhisatvacaryā abhūvan |
S04n544:13: na ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu pūrvaṃ caritavantaḥ śrutapūrvā abhūvan |
S04n544:18: yathā tānyanekāni bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi pūrveṣvasaṃkhyeyakalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasreṣvanekānāmasaṃkhyeyatathāgatakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇāmanekācintyaiḥ nānāvicitraiḥ pūjāśatasahasraiḥ sarvopakaraṇaiḥ pūjāṃ kariṣyanti |
S04n544:26: tatkena bhadanta bhagavan hetunā kena kāraṇena kīdṛśenoptakuśalamūlena ca tāni jvalanāntarate jorājapramukhāni daśadevaputrasahasrāṇīha bhagavato'ntikaṃ dharmaśravaṇāyopasaṃkrāmanti |
S04n544:29: prasannavadanotpalagandhakūṭānāmnā daśasu dikṣu daśabuddhasahasrāṇi loka utpatsyante vidyācaraṇasaṃpannāḥ sugatā lokavido'nuttarāḥ puruṣadamyasārathayaḥ śāstāro devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddhā bhagavantaḥ ||
S04n544:32: asti taduptaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ yasya kṛtatvādupacitatvādetāni jvalanāntaratejorājapramukhāni daśadevaputrasahasrāṇyetarhi trāyastriṃśadbhavanādiha dharmaśravaṇāyopasaṃkrāmanti |
S04n544:33: eteṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ satpuruṣāṇāmidaṃ bodhivyākaraṇaṃ śrutvā sahaśravaṇena kuladevate'sya suvarṇaprabhāsottamasya sūtrendrarājasyāntike citrīkāraprītiprasādapratilabdhā bhavanti |
S04n544:36: aparimitaṃ ca puṇyaskandhaṃ parigṛhītavanto bhavanti tāvaccaityadaivate jvalanāntaratejorājapramukhāni daśadevaputrasahasrāṇi sahaśravaṇenāsya sūtrendrarājasyāntike citrīkāraprasādapratilabdhā bhavanti |
S04n544:37: tāvadvimalavaiḍūryasadṛśena pariśuddhena cittena samanvāgatā bhavanti yāvadyākaraṇabhūmimanuprāptāḥ |
S04n544:38: anena kuladevate dharmaśravaṇakuśalamūlapracayenāpi pūrvapraṇidhānavaśenaitāni jvalanāntaratejorājapramukhāni daśadevaputrasahasrāṇyetarhyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau vyākṛtāni |
